/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy streets. The buildings, painted in shades of red and white, rise high into the sky, their facades reflecting the sunlight. The street below is a hive of activity with cars and taxis in motion, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Trees line the street, providing a touch of greenery amidst the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the colors of the cityscape.
